鮛字的基本解释

鮛
shū
小鲟鱼。

鮛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shū］
［《廣韻》式竹切，入屋，書。］
见“鮛鮪”。

鮛字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮛； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1468第27
【集韻】式竹切，音叔。魚名。【爾雅·釋魚註】鮪，鱣屬也。大者名王鮪，小者名鮛鮪。互詳鮥鮪二字註。【類篇】或作䱙。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋魚註】鮪，鱣屬也。大者名王鮪，小者名鮛。〕　謹照原文鮛下增鮪字。
鮛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鮛字的起名意思

暂无。

Yu
shū
Little sturgeon.
Yu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shū］
["Guangyun" style bamboo cut, enter the house, book. ]
See "鮛鮛鮮".
Yu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　宛; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1468 27
【Jiyun】style bamboo cut, uncle sound. The name of the fish. 【Erya·Shiyu Note】Tuna is also a genus of bonito. The big one is named King Tuna, and the smaller one is named King Tuna. Mutual detailed notes on the word 鮥鮥鮥. 【Classes】Or as qi. Textual research: [[Erya·Shiyu Note] Tuna, bonito belongs to also. The big one is named Wang Tong, and the small one is named Yu. 〕　I would like to add the word 鮛鮛 according to the original text.
Yu
